events.text: Flowers of the Eastern Plains. Written by K. Ludwig. Illustrations by Aquilla .
Katura Flowers : A common decorative plant found in temperate regions. Has trumpet-shaped flowers that can vary in color from white to pink and purple.

All parts of these plants contain alkaloid compounds that can act as a powerful deliriant if ingested. As the amount of alkaloids can vary wildly due to enviromental factors, consumption is highly discouraged as it can result in death.
Plum Rose : Not an actual rose. Has fruits that looks similar to the plum, that also happens to look aesthetically pleasing.
Despite this, ornamental variants are reported to be lacking in taste compared to variants that are specifically bred for consumptions. Has flowers that looks similar to the rose, albeit smaller.
Bell Lily : A common flower used for decoration and potion-making. Can act as a general mana-binding agent that is cheap and easy to produce.
A hardy plant that can withstand various enviromental conditions. Emits a faint blue glow and a sweet scent.
